meanings.definition: To make changes to the design or structure of something in order to improve it.
meanings.sent1: She is redesigning her website to make it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The company is redesigning its logo to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The cat is redesigning its sleeping spot by trying out different corners.
meanings.sent4: The artist is redesigning the canvas of the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: By redesigning the garden layout, she transformed it into a peaceful sanctuary.

meanings.definition: The act of making changes to the design or structure of something in order to improve it.
meanings.sent1: Redesigning requires careful planning and creativity.
meanings.sent2: The redesigning of the office layout boosted employee productivity.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about the chaos of office redesigning.
meanings.sent4: The redesigning of the cityscape symbolized progress and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The redesigning of the school playground made it a favorite spot for students.
